Articles.Content: In Administration Building, Career Mode, just starting out, Gus Kerbal offers the "Aggressive Negotiation" opportunity. In there, there word "definitely" is misspelled "definately." "Definitely" would be more correcter.
English is not my mother language, but is it also not "negotiation" , but rather "negociation" ?
No. It is pronounced as if it were spelled that way, but it is not spelled that way.
The game as a whole needs some Englishification, as I've pointed out on several occasions.
